casebody.data:
SANTANDER BANK, N.A., Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Garret F. GRIGGS and Laura F. Griggs, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
State of New Jersey, Defendant. C-813 September Term 2017
079980 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000705-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
